{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=EA8300 |serialnum_prefix=21P10C |asin=B06X9CPC45 |price=229.99 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, bridge |fcc_id=Q87-EA8300 |fcc_date=03/01/2017 |ic_id=3839A-EA8300 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, DFS, Bluetooth 4.1, 256QAM, |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK6388CF, K063800; |cpu1_cspeed=717 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=256 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF2G18AC-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK6388CF, K063800; |wi1_chip2_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip2_model=IPQ4019;Q, IPQ4019, 0VV, NK6388CF, K063800; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=QCA9886;Q, QCA9886, 0VV, NE643LNK, E064304; |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075;Q, QCA8075, 0VV, PU63626B, U063601; |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |addl_chips=Bluetooth 4.1 SoC;Cambridge Silicon Radio (CSR);CSR8811;CSR, 8811, A12U, K6338MT10;1; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85408-11;85408-11, 53999, 1632 MX;4; |default_ssid=LinksysXXXXX |oui=14:91:82 }}
:• 2x '''867Mbps''' - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• 1x '''400Mbps''' - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Max-Stream AC2200 Tri-Band Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.linksys.com/us/p/P-EA8300/}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=EA8300|pid=01t340000042dmYAAQ}} "EWW516-A1-BL REV:025(XC) 308.02448.025" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. FCC docs also cover the [[Linksys EA8250]]. According to the [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA8300/Test-Report/RF-Test-Report-BT-BR-EDR-3297072 RF Test Report BT BR+EDR], "All models are identical except for the EA8300 supports 256QAM and the EA8250 disable 256QAM." A [https://fccid.io/Q87-EA8300/Letter/C2PC-Letter-3989970 Class II Permissive Change on September 11, 2018] added two new models ([[Linksys MR8300|MR8300]] and [[Linksys MR8250|MR8250]]) which are marketed using "mesh" terminology. Both new models have a "new LED design" and both support 256QAM. The different names are used for marketing purposes. {{WiFiCert|WFA70248|02/17/2017}} Web GUI: http://LinksysSmartWiFi.com
